item.title: Price of Games
item.description: Background Lets get straight to the point, why pay more for PC games then you should? Pirate or not, it always feels better knowing you supported a developer, even if its minimal. Price of Games aimes to provide you with up to date prices of games across multiple stores/vendors, so you can get the best price on your new games. Architecture and History As I decided to dive into webapp development blindly and without direction in an attempt to learn quickly, the initial design decisions for POG are not ideal by any stretch.
